titles.title: Assault Weapon Financing Accountability Act
Assault Weapon Financing Accountability Act
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the making of short-term, Buy Now, Pay Later loans for the purchase of semiautomatic assault weapons.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Assault Weapon Financing Accountability Act
This bill makes it a crime to offer or accept certain short-term loans for the purchase of specified semiautomatic assault weapons.
